Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: An Indianapolis gymnastics coach who trained two members of the 2008 United States women’s Olympic team was found dead of an apparent suicide in his jail cell.
snippet: An Indianapolis gymnastics coach who trained two members of the 2008 United States women’s Olympic team was found dead of an apparent suicide in his jail cell.
